title: Template Title Updated.
subject: ${subj::e8dcecb1-39b7-4622-a643-c7dc9afcf850} with 3 tokens - ${subj::cd25b630-97bc-49ec-aaef-04bd84e7b090}, ${subj::d7485d92-1964-488b-80d7-34e89f46cc24}
htmlContent:
<!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.01 Transitional//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/html4/loose.dtd">
<html lang="en" style="font-family: sans-serif; font-size: 10px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);">
    <head>
        <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=UTF-8">
        <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1"> <!-- So that mobile will display zoomed in -->
        <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge"> <!-- enable media queries for windows phone 8 -->
        <meta name="format-detection" content="telephone=no"> <!-- disable auto telephone linking in iOS -->
        <title>${subj::e8dcecb1-39b7-4622-a643-c7dc9afcf850}​ with 3 tokens - ${subj::cd25b630-97bc-49ec-aaef-04bd84e7b090}​, ​ ${subj::d7485d92-1964-488b-80d7-34e89f46cc24}​</title>
        <style type="text/css">
            html { 
                font-family: sans-serif;
                -ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;
                -webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;
                font-size: 10px;
                -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);
            }
            body,.bodywrapper {
                margin: 0;
                padding:0;
                font-family: "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
                font-size: 14px;
                line-height: 1.42857143;
                color: #333333;
                background-color: #ffffff;
            }
            .emailbuilder_main{
                word-break: break-word;
                word-wrap: break-word;
            }
            .ExternalClass {
                width: 100%;
            }

            .ExternalClass,
            .ExternalClass p,
            .ExternalClass span,
            .ExternalClass font,
            .ExternalClass td,
            .ExternalClass div {
                line-height: 100%;
            }

            .ReadMsgBody {
                width: 100%;
                background-color: #ebebeb;
            }

            .content {
                /*padding-top: 5px;
                padding-bottom: 5px;*/
                background-color: #ffffff;
            }
            .container-padding {
                padding-left: 24px;
                padding-right: 24px;
            }
            .footer-text {
                font-family: "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
                font-size: 12px;
                line-height: 16px;
                color: #4F4F4F;
            }
            .footer-text a {
                color: #4F4F4F;
            }

            table {
                mso-table-lspace: 0pt;
                mso-table-rspace: 0pt;
            }

            img {
                -ms-interpolation-mode: bicubic;
            }

            .yshortcuts a {
                border-bottom: none !important;
            }

            @media screen and (max-width: 599px) {
                table[class="force-row"],
                table[class="container"] {
                    width: 100% !important;
                    max-width: 100% !important;
                }
            }
            @media screen and (max-width: 400px) {
                td[class*="container-padding"] {
                    padding-left: 12px !important;
                    padding-right: 12px !important;
                }
            }
            .ios-footer a {
                color: #4F4F4F !important;
                text-decoration: underline;
            }
        </style>
    </head>
    <body style="font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); margin: 0px; padding: 0px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);" bgcolor="#ffffff" leftmargin="0" topmargin="0" marginwidth="0" marginheight="0">
        <!-- 100% background wrapper (grey background) -->
        <table border="0" width="100%" height="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" bgcolor="#ffffff" class="bodywrapper" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">
            <tbody><tr>
                <td align="left" valign="top" bgcolor="#ffffff" style="background-color: #ffffff;padding-left: 5px; padding-right: 5px;padding-top: 5px;padding-bottom: 5px">
                    <!-- 600px container (white background) -->
                    <table border="0" width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" class="container emailbuilder_container" bgcolor="#ffffff" style="background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">
                        <tbody><tr>
                            <td class="content emailbuilder_main" align="left" bgcolor="#ffffff" style="font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); word-break: break-word; word-wrap: break-word; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">
                                <div class="polyfixpara" style="box-sizing: border-box; padding-top: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px;">Hi <span style="box-sizing: border-box; line-height: 1.42857;">${embd::54718ad7-b373-4b63-81f4-4635d5c46e23}<span style="box-sizing: border-box;">​</span>,</span></div><div class="polyfixpara" style="box-sizing: border-box; padding-top: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px;"><br style="box-sizing: border-box;"></div><div class="polyfixpara" style="box-sizing: border-box; padding-top: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px;">This is an early heads up -</div><div class="polyfixpara" style="box-sizing: border-box; padding-top: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px;">There are two teams that would be requesting for Beta Releases post the GonG Release on Dec 22nd.</div><div class="polyfixpara" style="box-sizing: border-box; padding-top: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px;">These will be included in the customer upgrade on Jan 7th. The teams include:</div><blockquote style="box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 14px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 40px; border: none; padding: 0px;"><div class="polyfixpara" style="box-sizing: border-box; padding-top: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px;"></div><ul style="box-sizing: border-box; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 10px;"><li style="box-sizing: border-box; margin-left: 0px;"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; line-height: 1.42857;">RAW: For Success Snapshots and Success Plan Exports</span></li><li style="box-sizing: border-box; margin-left: 0px;"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; line-height: 1.42857;">Transformers: For S3 Connector</span></li></ul><div class="polyfixpara" style="box-sizing: border-box; padding-top: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px;"></div></blockquote><div class="polyfixpara" style="box-sizing: border-box; padding-top: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px;"><br style="box-sizing: border-box;"></div><div class="polyfixpara" style="box-sizing: border-box; padding-top: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px;">This plan was agreed upon in consultation with the stakeholders and the QA leads are in the loop.</div><div class="polyfixpara" style="box-sizing: border-box; padding-top: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px;"><br style="box-sizing: border-box;"></div><div class="polyfixpara" style="box-sizing: border-box; padding-top: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px;">Thanks,</div><div class="polyfixpara" style="box-sizing: border-box; padding-top: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px;">${embd::d6a5ec5b-3764-4711-84f8-0c2214f7e0ed}<span style="box-sizing: border-box;">​</span>,</div>
                            </td>
                        </tr>
                        <tr><td><br></td></tr>
                    </tbody></table><!--/600px container -->
                </td>
            </tr>
        </tbody></table><!--/100% background wrapper-->
    

</body>
</html>
